text: Khotimlya () is a rural locality (a village) in Bik-Karmalinsky Selsoviet, Davlekanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 221 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 32 km from Davlekanovo, 5 km from Bik-Karmaly. == References == Category:Rural localities in Davlekanovsky District
title: Khotimlya
